image_alt_text: A split graphic with the left side showing a stack of unstable blue baskets leaning like a collapsing Jenga tower, with the text "Stop playing Jenga." The right side has a blue gradient background with the heading "Focus on patients" and a list of services with green tick boxes: Pharmacy First, NMS, IP clinics, Vaccinations, Ear wax, Weight management, Patient conversations. A black footer shows the TITAN logo and a blue "Book a demo" button.
